page.title: 14FARMING
page.content: Farming is the main source of employment in our block. It is mostly dairy farming. Recently, one dairy herd was sold off. One farm of particular interest is Meadlands Farm. Although the main farm buildings are just outside our block, much of the land is within it. The have a herd of Short Horn cows and some sheep. The Short Horns are not seen very often now in this country. Most farmers do not breed them any more because they do not give very much milk. The advantage is that they do not eat so much grass. There is an interesting smallholding close to Stawley church. It supports at least eight beautiful goats which are milked by hand, a variety of chickens, plus donkeys, horses and peacocks.
